MAIN_MESSAGE: We apologise that today's pre-arranged work affecting your property in the KA13 postcode area of Kilwinning is still ongoing. This is due to difficult ground conditions onsite and we now expect power to be back on by 5pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4.04pm on the 21st of October 2020.
